sinks.name: TEE_Free
sinks.reason: Tainted pointer could lead to freeing invalid memory, causing potential memory corruption or crashes.

sinks.name: TEE_GenerateRandom
sinks.reason: Output buffer could be shared with Normal World, leading to potential data leakage.

sinks.name: TEE_GenerateRandom
sinks.reason: Size parameter could be tainted, leading to buffer overflow or out-of-bounds access.

sinks.name: TEE_Malloc
sinks.reason: Size parameter can be tainted, leading to buffer overflows or memory corruption issues.

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Destination could be shared with Normal World, leading to potential data exposure.

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Size parameter could be manipulated, leading to buffer overflow or memory corruption.
